###
### Super buff for Maggie.  Cheating!
###
### Vastly buffs Maggie's damage, and makes it not consume any ammo.
### Used by myself primarily just for mod testing purposes, for when I don't
### want to be bothered by actual combat.  Originally used just to power
### through those interminable Slaughters, though.
###
### Generated by gen_maggie_super_buff.py
###

prefix: Maggie

SparkPatchEntry,(1,1,0,),/Game/Gear/Weapons/Pistols/Jakobs/_Shared/_Design/_Unique/Maggie/Parts/Part_PS_JAK_Barrel_Maggie.Part_PS_JAK_Barrel_Maggie,InventoryAttributeEffects,0,,((AttributeToModify=GbxAttributeData'"/Game/GameData/Weapons/Att_Weapon_Damage.Att_Weapon_Damage"',ModifierType=ScaleSimple,ModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=50)),(AttributeToModify=GbxAttributeData'"/Game/GameData/Weapons/Att_Weapon_Spread.Att_Weapon_Spread"',ModifierType=ScaleSimple,ModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=3.5)),(AttributeToModify=GbxAttributeData'"/Game/GameData/Weapons/Att_Weapon_MaxLoadedAmmo.Att_Weapon_MaxLoadedAmmo"',ModifierType=PreAdd,ModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=4)),(AttributeToModify=GbxAttributeData'"/Game/GameData/Weapons/Att_Weapon_CustomSightColorScheme.Att_Weapon_CustomSightColorScheme"',ModifierType=OverrideBaseValue,ModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1)),(AttributeToModify=GbxAttributeData'"/Game/GameData/Weapons/Att_Weapon_ShotAmmoCost.Att_Weapon_ShotAmmoCost"',ModifierType=OverrideBaseValue,ModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0)))
